text: Athens is a city in Henderson County, Texas, in the United States. As of the 2020 census, the city population was 12,857. It is the county seat of Henderson County. It was named after Athens, Alabama, by one of the early residents who came from there. == People == Athens has 12,857 people living there. ==References== == Other websites == Category:Cities in Texas Category:County seats in Texas
title: Athens, Texas
